[COMMANDS]
_excel c:$/patching\test.bat $S $R$/exceladdin.txt
_word c:$/patching\test.bat $S $R$/wordaddin.txt
_nodelocal c:$/patching$/nodelocal.bat nodelocal.js $R
[FILES]
ignore node_modules/uglify-js/**/*
uglify node_modules/syracuse-lic/lib/encrypt.js
uglify node_modules/syracuse-(core|ui|rtf)/**/*
uglify node_modules/syracuse-main/html/**/*
uglify node_modules/msoffice/**/*
uglify node_modules/syracuse-sdata/lib/httpHelper
encrypt node_modules/syracuse-*/**/*
encrypt node_modules/streamline-auth/**/*
extra node_modules/neu.*
copy node_modules/neu.*
ignore **/*.(c|cpp|h|sh|asm|md|coffee|afm|as|cc|tbl|msg)
# the following line can be removed when the corresponding contracts are removed from nodeconfig.js
copy node_modules/(sprint1|zz)/**/*
copy node_modules/syracuse-ui/lib/**/tests/*.(_js|js)
ignore node_modules/**/(test|tests|examples|bin)/**/*
ignore **/.*
ignore (.git|try-git|tools|deps|import|stubs|x3index)/**/*
copy **/*.(png|bmp|html|css|ico|jpg|db|gif|swf)
copy **/*.json
# encrypt node_modules/**/*.(_js|js)
copy node_modules/**/*.(_js|js)
copy index.js
_nodelocal nodelocal*.js
copy node_modules/**/*.xml
_excel dotnet/ExcelAddIn/**/*
_word dotnet/WordAddIn/**/*
ignore dotnet/**/*
ignore config.txt
